name: iSmoke Weed HD - Colorado Edition
description:
A healthy and legal way to enjoy the medicinal powers of medical marijuana in the scenic surroundings of Colorado!

Grind it, Roll it, and light it up! Then listen to the awesome original soundtrack, and enjoy the relaxing ambiance by smoking through the Microphone!

High definition 3D graphics!

Amazing Soundtrack - by hip hop sensation "Earn Dawg"

Works best on iPhone 5 and later.
